Watch the trailers

Explore world of The JunkYard Simulator that has been developed by 2 people and published by the PlayWay.

Search everything.

Open it. Take it. Blast it.

Paint it. Fix it. Assemble it.

Enjoy it.

You’ll start with a big hangover, empty pocket and avalanche of garbage. Luckily you have one of the biggest Junk Yard in the area and the world revolves around scrap-metal and garbage.

Explore the most important mechanics of the Junk Yard gameplay.

87% of the latest opinions are positive. We selected some of our favorites.

System Requirements

OS: Windows(64-bit) 7 or Newer

Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB VRAM

DirectX: Version 9.0c

Storage: 20 GB available space
Languages English, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
